title: Toodles
description: TUI tasks applications made with GO and BubbleTea, this is probably my second project in Go after sub-cli

highlights.title: Go & Type Safety
highlights.description: Written in Go, it offers robust type safety and a seamless developer experience, with blazing-fast build and testing performance.

highlights.title: UI & UX
highlights.description: Built with Charm.sh tools like Bubble Tea and Lipgloss, it delivers a polished and visually appealing terminal app experience.

highlights.title: Database & Security
highlights.description: Powered by SQLite, it stores everything in a single file, ensuring offline functionality by default and keeping your data securely local.

features: Generate an autocompletion script for the specified shell.
List all tasks, categorized by completed, pending, or canceled status.
List all tasks, excluding completed ones.
More features planned, but currently limited by time constraints.
